original_title: 家族想いでエッチなDQN娘 まおちゃん
overview: Hamasaki family living in a certain prefecture. My father's company is suffering from the recent recession and my family's life is also in need, but a bright family who lives in harmony with three parents and children by caring for the process of the mother who died Mao-chan, a lively one daughter It's a very brutal family where I teach my daughter something naughty, and my daughter volunteers for it to immerse myself in joy. Mao-chan, who was nurtured in such an environment, takes off both the skin and the skin for his beloved family.
title: A Sexy DQN Girl Who Loves Her Family Little Miss Mao
